# THIS FILE HAS BEEN GENERATED BY THE BUILD CONFIGURATION SYSTEM - DO NOT EDIT

set(MINECPP_API_DIR ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR})

add_library(minecpp_api STATIC)

# Public include headers
target_include_directories(minecpp_api
  PUBLIC ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/include
  PRIVATE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/include/minecpp
)

# Source subdirectory
add_subdirectory("src")

target_link_libraries(minecpp_api
        LINK_PUBLIC
        minecpp_nbt
        minecpp_network
        libmb
)
